lines.text: It was-- yeah, it was stuck in the wall and then we removed it, but it was like, it was stuck on purpose and I think it like opened--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no receptacle for it in this world where it was in the mirror world?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I saw, but I can double check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go back and check and it's just a straight wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything in the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything around the brass frame that looks like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to knock on one of the eggs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm grasping at straws here, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to-- yeah, I'm watching you do this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we got to play a tune.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I go up against the glacier, put my hand on the glacier, and see if I can hear anything again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you put your ear up to it and listen, make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use sharp in here--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what other people have described, the same thing, you see that strange porcelain shape.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and use a chunk of mirror to look inside one of the eggs that I can reach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing in there? It just makes a tone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we try hitting them at the same time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester's saying we should try and play the song that she heard radiating through the statue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can she try and duplicate? Can she hit them and then try and duplicate the song?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, even though you have your feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Jester goes around and eventually finds the-- (singing tones) (singing tones) (rumbling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hands are both forward clutched like this in the chest and its heads looking down standing there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I can see through the glacier now from this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glacier wall opened up once the music theme was played.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does me have anything to do with it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean it's my thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You should do the-- you should stab the thing in the heart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should do it from 30 feet away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we could do that too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not stabbing-- we're going to put it in the hands, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean I will do it, I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you're hurt too, let's not--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it from a safe distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll Mage Hand and carry the dagger over and place it in the angel's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like handle first into the hand?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess handle first, but my instinct was to stab the thing in the heart, but I've been overruled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You place the handle and it doesn't fit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will flip it over and go in knife side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We haven't had a proper dungeon crawl in a long time! This has been fun!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to name my next ulcer after you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A finite number of mirrors we could have come through, right? Destroying them wouldn't have done anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am jelly, this is good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't seen that guy in a while, Obann.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but his tracks led this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And, when it was like this, were the cheeks unstained or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It was clean, and then once the dagger was placed in, they began to bleed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we have made it farther than our friend, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All sorts of things can happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until then, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
